name: difundir
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(cdif(cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cdif(c0, c2), cdif(c1, c2)))

comment: Distributive law for class difference. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2004.)
